title: Penny serenade [DVD]
brief_description: Leaving her husband, a woman contemplating divorce recollects in a series of flashbacks the story of her courtship and marriage, the shattering loss of her unborn child, financial struggles, and the emotional upheaval of adopting a child. Stars Irene Dunn and Cary Grant.
